name: xdo-ui
description: A science fiction desktop running everywhere. Awesome.

scripts.install-linux: npm install && cd src && npm install && ./../node_modules/.bin/electron-rebuild -f -w node-pty && cd ..
scripts.preinstall-windows: npm install --global --production windows-build-tools && npm install --global node-gyp && setx PYTHON "%USERPROFILE%\.windows-build-tools\python27\python.exe"
scripts.install-windows: npm install && cd src && npm install && ..\node_modules\.bin\electron-rebuild.cmd -f -w node-pty && cd ..
scripts.prebuild-linux: rsync -a --info=progress2 src/ prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install
scripts.prebuild-darwin: rsync -a src/ prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install
scripts.prebuild-windows: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('prebuild-src')) fs.rmSync('prebuild-src', {recursive:true, force:true}); fs.mkdirSync('prebuild-src');" && xcopy src\* prebuild-src\ /E /C /Q /Y && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install
scripts.build:win: npm install && npm run prebuild-windows && npm run build-windows && npm run postbuild-windows
scripts.build:linux: npm install && npm run prebuild-linux && npm run build-linux && npm run postbuild-linux
scripts.build:darwin: npm install && npm run prebuild-darwin && npm run build-darwin && npm run postbuild-darwin
scripts.test: rsync -a --info=progress2 src/ prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install && snyk test && cd .. && rm -R prebuild-src
scripts.update-file-icons: git submodule foreach git pull origin master && node file-icons-generator.js

author: Linux-K https://github.com/Linux-K-Git/XDo-UI
